title: Hot,humid weather likely to prevail in most parts
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP):The Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD) Saturday forecast hot and humid weather would likely to prevail in most most parts of the country during next 24 hours However,
rain wind-thundershower is expected in east Punjab and Kashmir , a shallow monsoon currents are penetrating in lower parts of the country, a MET office reported.
Rainfall(mm) recorded in Sindh: Chacharo 35, Diplo 23, Mithi 19, Kaloi 07, Chhor 03, Dhahali, Badin 02, Balochistan: Kohlu 09, Zhob 04 and Khuzdar 01.
Maximum temperature’s recorded as (°C): Sibbi 46, Nokkundi 44, Turbat 43, Jacobabad and Dalbandin 42.
